fields.description:
Description:
The menu button does not function in any of the menu tests in KS.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Base UI >Menu (android)> any
3) Attempt to run test

Result:
No menu is displayed

Expected:
Menu displays and functions
fields.summary: Android: Menu: v8/Rhino: Menu button does not function in menu tests
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111108105548, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201111061615, Nexus S (2.3.6), Galaxy 10.1 Tab (3.1) v8 compiler & Rhino compiler

comments.body:
Tested with 1.8.0.1.v20111207090257
Xoom (3.2.1) - v8
Samsung Tab 10.1 (3.1) - rhino
